user.desc: I’m a Full Stack Developer specialized in AI and automation, building end-to-end solutions that connect reactive frontends, robust APIs, and intelligent agents. I orchestrate automated workflows, LLM integrations, and cloud-native services with an emphasis on security, observability, and cost efficiency. My goal is to reduce operational toil and accelerate value delivery with reliable, measurable systems that are easy to evolve.

destaquesSecao.subtitulo: See some of my main works here.

projetosSecao.subtitulo: See some of my projects here.

experienciaSecao.subtitulo: See here a little about my journey.

habilidadesSecao.subtitulo: See some of my technical skills here.

contatoSecao.subtitulo: Did you like what you saw? Reach out through one of these channels.
contatoSecao.alert: Please fill in all fields to send the message

chat.mensagemInicial: Hello! How can I help you today? Ask anything about Guilherme.

servicosSecao.subtitulo: Complete solutions to transform your ideas into digital reality.

sites.descricao: Modern, responsive, and optimized institutional websites for your company

landing.descricao: Conversion-optimized pages to increase your sales and leads

ecommerce.descricao: Complete online stores with payment system and product management

linkBio.descricao: Custom pages to centralize all your links and social media

manutencao.descricao: Technical support, updates, and continuous improvements for your website

personalizado.descricao: Tailor-made solutions for your business’s specific needs

experiencia01.descricao: I work as a FullStack Developer at Puc Minas' Experimental Agency, actively participating in the Grade Inteligente and Landing Page projects, where I gained practical experience in non-profit initiatives. I develop using Java with SpringBoot, and TypeScript on the frontend.

experiencia02.descricao: I work on the development of automated solutions and handling large volumes of data using PHP, Python, HTML, and PostgreSQL. I create bots and automations to optimize processes, as well as contribute to the front-end of applications and database management.

experiencia03.descricao: I developed a personalized web page for a client, meeting their specific design and functionality needs. For the project, I used React, TypeScript, and Tailwind to build a responsive and intuitive interface. I delivered the project within the agreed timeframe, achieving high client satisfaction.

experiencia04.papel: Treasury Coordinator - Obra Jovem Santa Helena
experiencia04.descricao: I was the Treasury Coordinator of Obra Jovem Santa Helena, responsible for managing the treasury and financing of the project.

experiencia05.descricao: Project-oriented education with a solid foundation in architecture, data structures, databases, and embedded systems. Emphasis on best practices (such as testing, version control, and CI/CD), agile methodologies, and AI fundamentals to build scalable, secure, and production-ready solutions.

experiencia06.papel: Perseverance Coordinator - Obra Jovem Santa Helena
experiencia06.descricao: I was the Perseverance Coordinator of Obra Jovem Santa Helena, responsible for catechism and the formation of young Catholics.
